seniority_level.evidence: Title is Data Engineer with broad responsibilities but no senior title or years of experience specified.

job_family.evidence: Title is Data Engineer and responsibilities focus on pipelines, modeling, and data platform work.

sub_specialty.evidence: Job description emphasizes data modeling, CDC, data quality testing, and pipeline development.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people‑management or technical‑lead responsibilities; role appears to be an individual contributor.

primary_cloud.evidence: No specific cloud provider (AWS, GCP, Azure) is referenced in the posting.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud platforms are mentioned.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions both CDC (real‑time change capture) and batch workflow orchestration (Airflow, Luigi).

orchestrator_category.evidence: Airflow is explicitly listed among required tools (Airflow, Luigi, Dagster, Prefect).

storage_layer.evidence: References to data lake concepts and raw data storage patterns.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location restriction to Seoul, South Korea; geo‑restriction type is specific_countries with allowed country KR.

timezone_focus.evidence: Job is based in South Korea, which is in the APAC region.

relocation_required.evidence: On‑site role in Seoul with no relocation offer or requirement mentioned.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is not mentioned in the posting.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No reference to OPT/CPT or student visa support.

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work‑authorization text is provided.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type and contract type are not stated.

benefits_level.evidence: Benefits array is empty; no benefits are described in the posting.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: The posting does not discuss career ladders, promotion tracks, or growth opportunities.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship program or mentorship language is present.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion or advancement paths.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No reference to internal transfers or lateral moves.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No explicit IC, management, specialist, or architect tracks are described.

requirement_strictness.evidence: A long list of required hard skills (SQL, Python, Airflow, Luigi, Dagster, Prefect, Great Expectations, Soda, Databricks, CDC) with no nice‑to‑have items.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description focuses specifically on data engineering tasks and responsibilities.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required skill set aligns with typical mid‑level data engineer expectations; no unrealistic senior‑level demands.
